words.source: H499 conj. waw + proper noun masculine (אֶלְעָזָר, 'Eleazar', meaning 'God has helped'); KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Eleazar'
H1121 noun common masculine singular construct of בֵּן 'son'; KJV 'son of', ESV 'son of', NASB 'son of'
H175 (אַהֲרֹן, 'Aaron'), proper noun masculine; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Aaron'
H3947 Qal perfect 3ms of לָקַח 'to take'; KJV 'took', ESV 'took', NASB 'married'
Preposition l- + 3ms pronominal suffix; KJV 'him', ESV implied, NASB implied
H1323 prep. min + noun common feminine plural construct of בַּת 'daughter'; KJV 'one of the daughters of', ESV 'of the daughters of', NASB 'from the daughters of'
H6317 (פּוּטִיאֵל, 'Putiel'), proper noun masculine; KJV 'Putiel', ESV 'Putiel', NASB 'Putiel'
Preposition l- + 3ms pronominal suffix; KJV 'him', ESV implied, NASB implied
H802 prep. l- + noun common feminine singular of אִשָּׁה 'woman, wife'; KJV 'to wife', ESV 'as his wife', NASB 'as a wife'
H3205 wayyiqtol 3fs Qal of יָלַד 'to bear, give birth'; KJV 'she bare', ESV 'she bore', NASB 'she bore'
Preposition l- + 3ms pronominal suffix; KJV 'him', ESV 'him', NASB 'him'
H853 (אֵת), particle direct object marker; untranslated in English
H6372 (פִּינְחָס, 'Phinehas'), proper noun masculine; KJV 'Phinehas', ESV 'Phinehas', NASB 'Phinehas'
H428 (אֵלֶּה, 'these'), demonstrative pronoun plural; KJV 'these are', ESV 'these are', NASB 'these are'
H7218 noun common masculine plural construct of רֹאשׁ 'head, chief'; KJV 'heads of', ESV 'heads of', NASB 'heads of'
H1 noun common masculine plural construct of אָב 'father'; KJV 'fathers of', ESV 'fathers' houses of', NASB 'households of'
H3881 article + gentilic noun masculine plural (הַלְּוִיִּם, 'the Levites'); KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'the Levites'
H4940 prep. l- + noun common feminine plural construct of מִשְׁפָּחָה 'family, clan' + 3mp suffix; KJV 'after their families', ESV 'by their clans', NASB 'according to their families'
